forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
